price: 77. Weten zij dan niet dat Allah weet, wat zij verbergen en in de openbaarheid brengen?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
